input.sentences: the thief left papers all over the place .
the place was a complete mess .
the thief ransacked my kitchen completely .
the thief ran out through my back porch .
output.sentences: After attending the concert with a friend, we came back to her house--she was robbed.
There were papers everywhere, he must have been looking for something very specific.
Old mail, magazines, news papers and my bank accounts were all over the floor.
We walked into the kitchen, that was when we heard the curtains by the back window rustle.
The thief was still there when we came back, he just narrowly escaped out the back window and ran into the night.
